arts.ttl: Frank Lampard explains why Ben Sheaf and Brandon Thomas-Asante sat out against Derby County
arts.sum: The head coach refused to go into details of Sky Blues captain Sheaf’s latest setback, although it doesn’t appear to be too serious with the hope that he’ll be back in contention for the weekend, while Thomas-Asante’s problem is one that’s currently being “managed”. Get the latest Coventry City news sent straight to your phone by joining our Sky Blues WhatsApp group.

arts.ttl: Frank Lampard outlines one big positive after winning run ends at Derby County
arts.sum: Frank Lampard refused to criticise his Coventry City players too much after their incredible run of nine wins out of ten came crashing to an end at his former club Derby County. Get the latest Coventry City news sent straight to your phone by joining our Sky Blues WhatsApp group.

arts.ttl: Derby end Coventry run on Lampard return as they boost survival hopes
arts.sum: Matt Clarke and Marcus Harness struck in each half to help Derby boost their Sky Bet Championship survival hopes with a 2-0 victory over in-form Coventry on Frank Lampard's return to Pride Park.

arts.ttl: Coventry City player ratings with plenty of 5s as winning run comes to an end at Derby County - Andy Turner
arts.sum: Despite dominating much of the opening 20 minutes, City conceded from a well-worked free-kick sent in by Marcus Harness and headed home at the back post by centre-half Matt Clark who, disappointingly, evaded both Bobby Thomas and Liam Kitching. In as a straight swap for Jay Dasilva and did well, bombing forward on the overlap in the first half but gave away the free-kick - for which he got booked - that resulted in Derby’s second goal.

arts.ttl: Derby boost survival hopes with win over Coventry on Frank Lampard’s return
arts.sum: Lampard came back to Derby for the first time since he left the club in 2019.

arts.ttl: Steven Gerrard vs Frank Lampard through a Rangers lens as clear winner emerges to give new owners an answer
arts.sum: Former England stars Steven Gerrard and Frank Lampard, who have both had mixed managerial careers, have both been touted for vacant manager's position at Rangers

arts.ttl: John Eustace names Derby County team to face Coventry City as Jeff Hendrick decision made
arts.sum: Join our Derby County WhatsApp group to get the latest Rams headlines sent straight to your phone. John Eustace made two changes to his Derby County starting XI as the Rams went in search of a second successive Championship win as Frank Lampard returned to Pride Park with Coventry City tonight.

arts.ttl: Derby County v Coventry City - TV channel, live stream and kick-off time for vital clash - Derbyshire Live
arts.sum: Derby County will host the Championship's most in-form side, Coventry City, on Tuesday (March 11) with John Eustace hoping the Rams can pick up three vital points in their bid for survival. What time does Derby County v Coventry City kick off?

arts.ttl: Derby County v Coventry City live updates and team news from Pride Park
arts.sum: Get the latest Coventry City news sent straight to your phone by joining our Sky Blues WhatsApp group. Coventry City take on relegation battlers Derby County tonight looking to extend the club's incredible run of results to ten wins from 11 Championship matches - a sequence that has propelled the Sky Blues into the play-off places.

arts.ttl: Coventry City predicted team as Frank Lampard waits on fitness tests for injured duo v Derby - Andy Turner
arts.sum: Get the latest Coventry City news sent straight to your phone by joining our Sky Blues WhatsApp group. The City boss has injury doubts over winger Ephron Mason-Clark (toe) and right-back Milan van Ewijk (Achilles) after both players were forced to withdraw from Saturday’s 3-2 win over Stoke, meaning he could be forced into at least two changes.
